name: Captain Lycop : Invasion of the Heters
description: A space shooter mixing adventure, action and tactics. Face off against pen-pushing insects, merciless enemies and epic bosses. Your only hope is to banish all cowardice and follow a virtuous path.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Pentium dual core 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 520M Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Seven or above Processor: Core i3 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 630M Storage: 550 MB available space
